data.title: Gross Cultural Arts Center
data.meta_description: The Downing-Gross Cultural Arts Center is an events venue and a hub for music, theater, film, dance, and art in Newport News. Home to the Ella Fitzgerald Theater, the center hosts performances and offers private event rentals.
data.text:
Join us as we celebrate the hard work of our DG theater campers, who over the course of six weeks fine-tuned their skills in art, music, and literacy- all while learning the inner workings of theater production.

The classic tale of kindness to animals trots, crawls and flies onto the stage in Doctor Dolittle JR. All of the characters we've come to love through the stories of Hugh Lofting and the magical movie musical are given new life in the stage version.

The musical tells the classic tale of a wacky, but kind, doctor who can talk to animals, taking the audience on a journey from the small English village of Puddleby-on-the-Marsh to the far corners of the world. When Doctor Dolittle attempts to help a seal named Sophie, he’s wrongly accused of murder and stands trial before General Bellowes. Once pronounced innocent, Dolittle is free to continue with his search for the Great Pink Sea Snail — the oldest and wisest of the creatures on earth.

July 27, 2024

Show times: 11 AM & 3PM

August 13, 2024 - JOIN US!

Join us for this warm and welcoming open mic night held in person on the second Tuesday of every month at 7:00 pm. Don’t forget to join our 25 Mics Facebook Group to stay connected between meetings.

*Our thoughts go out to our host Quinton “Q5” & family as he continues to heal. We continue to wish him the best. We will see you soon! - DGCAC

No experience is required! We will start with the basics of theatrical performance and learn as a group. Students looking for a way to break out of their shells are just as welcome as those seasoned performers looking to expand their training.

Sessions resume in August.

Put your training to the test and Audition for upcoming children’s shows.

*Be sure to sign up in PERSON at the Customer Service Window.

A collective of creative minds forging diamond-level performances from their own original written work. Check your ego and get ready to have your best breakthrough in the Break Room Experience. Open to all performing artists who want to be their best! Participants will learn skills and terminology associated with awesome performance. Participants will become confident and competent performers who know how to navigate various performance settings like a professional. This workshop offers a wealth of knowledge to anyone lucky enough to participate.

*Put your training to the test and Audition for upcoming mainstage shows or Show your hard work at our 25 Mics Open Mic night—the 2nd Tuesday of every month.

REGISTER NOW!
